Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery vessel, both the interior and exterior are worn, with remains of incised mu on the exterior.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394346) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394346)
